name: Radio Rwanda
description: Radio Rwanda (Radiyo Rwanda) is a broadcast radio station in Kigali, Rwanda, providing News, Talk and Information as part of the Rwandan Office of Information (ORINFOR), a government information agency.f

description: Radio Flash FM 89.2 is a broadcast Radio station from Kigali, Rwanda, providing news, current affairs, informative jounalism on local, national and international matters, sports and the best mix of music.

name: KT RADIO
description: KT Radio is an independent news, information and entertainment radio station founded in July 2012 to run a web-based and FM radio.

name: 94.3 ROYAL FM
description:
94.3 ROYAL FM targets the 18 - 35 year old age group, ABC1C2
Social class audience with a brand promise offering, “Better
information,the best Music”. This target audience is aspirational, seeks
information, active, interested in people, places and entertainment,
politically aware, and making key choices that will affect their lives.

name: Umucyo Radio
description: Umucyo radio is the first Christian radio station in Rwanda.we broadcast full Gospel since 2005 up to now. we have seen too many lives changing through the radio preaching.we thank God for what he is doing within us.

name: Energy Radio
description:
Energy Radio is first private radio station founded outside of Kigali City owned by TOP5SAI Ltd for a rationale targeting the creative generation (career persons, jobs creators, business professionals, development actors, politicians, policy makers and ordinary citizens). 
Energy Radio is an open forum where creative generation meet, exchange ideas, mentor each other and engage in a positive deviance to leverage sustainable development.
The incorporation of “Energy” in all people’s endeavors will kick off “inactivity” and result into “ an energized generation”.

name: Radio Salus
description: Radio Salus is the National University of Rwanda radio station, covering about 85% of the whole country.

name: Imbaraga Internet Radio
description: Imbaraga Radio is an internet radio station from Kigali, Rwanda, providing Top 40 Adult Contemporary World Pop and Hip Hop music. Imbaraga Radio also provides information to the Rwanda Diaspora through commentary, news and entertainment.
